column5: Date: Tuesday, July 5, 2011 Location: Shallow weed bed close to reeds Productive baits: weightless senko (red, white, pink, green, orange, pretty much any colour!!!), white spinner bait, flipping beavers and berkley chigger craw. Team members: kevin & KelfuN, they easily outfished me!  Enjoy the pics!
This is a great action shot. I love the water rolling off.
How big was that hog in the 4th pic? Looks like a nickel for sure...
Grew up just down the road from there.  Lake St. Clair is a great body of water.  The owners of Bass Haven are great people to boot.  Looks like you had a great day.  Cheers  Craig
Looks like ol'round eye (geoff)is jealous of you young_one. LOL  It's an ancient Chinese secret to catch those big fish, you round eye.
Nice Thanx for posting, I'm hoping to fish the CBAF Tourney there this year SBK
well I haven't seen any reports from you so far grasshopper...
already seen them  but once again, nice work out there!  Gotta get together soon!
Nice muskie!  (No need for the Boga grip, they won't kill you  )
